content.rendered:
PLG, a 26 story residential complex towering over Prospect Lefferts Gardens, offers this and more. Interiors designed by Whitehall Interiors, Interiors designed by Whitehall, a resident receives 50,000 sq ft of resort-style amenities, premium interior residencies, and an unobstructed 360-degree view of New York.

Swaths of light and unbelievable views of the skyline beautifully complement its interiors. Designed to create an unforgettable living experience, Whitehall developed two distinct color palettes to contrast the city’s raw tones to feel both organic and elegant. The interiors of PLG are unique in its ability to incorporate the abundance of natural light that enrich the space while enhancing the luxury and comfort. From its high end stainless steel appliances to the use of wood and natural stone, each and every detail was carefully designed with unyielding dedication to end-user experience.
